name: Hunting Fish
description:
Are you looking for a game to relax? We want to show you a very exciting and funny game — Hunting Fish. A lovely fish lost it`s greatest treasure — a shiny pearl, and swore to itself to find it at all costs. Help it to swim without hindrance as long as possible. This game has realized in the horizontal mode, so it will give you an opportunity to relax and enjoy after a hard day's work.

Features:
— Free.
— A funny storyline.
— A beautiful user interface.
— A relaxing gameplay.
— You can easily pass the game.
— No ads in the game screen.
— A possibility to choose a character.

Design by:
Taisia Yaroshenko

Programmer:
Nikolay Smorgun

Sound Engineer:
Anastasia Levchenko
